entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning then light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
